title: Crime Alert 04.24.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.24.19
description:
Arrest made in road rage incident where two children are shot. Police offer reward for help in solving decades old murder. Thieves are stealing used cooking grease.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
